channel.title: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?
channel.description:
https://app.auxy.co/projects/n0QjOMmejcN0bMOFw9i86Q==
[poll type=regular public=true] * Major * Minor * Harmonic Minor? Idk * Great either way * Kill it, it sounds horrible both ways [/poll]
I’m thinking about making an album because everyone else is. It’ll also help me come up with melodies more efficiently.

item.title: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?
item.dc:creator: Shepdoge
item.description:
My view: pancakes -> happy -> major

sOUnd LoGIc

Read full topic

item.title: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?
item.dc:creator: lowey
item.description:
Major works better imo. You could still get an awesome track out of the minor version, but to my ears this song begs for major.

item.title: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?

item.description:

item.source: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?

item.title: Does this sound better in Major or Minor?
item.dc:creator: Trey
item.description:
HA
Trick question because all your loops are in chromatic so that setting won’t change anything!

Even if they weren’t, the major (I’m pretty sure) only raises the 3rd and 6th a half step, so I looked at the loops and there weren’t a lot of those notes. Probably wouldnt make a very noticeable difference

Read full topic
